text: 1.5 Sng 89.27, Ais 55.4, Jon 15.9, 18.37, Epe 1.20, Kol 1.18, 1 Ti 6.13, Hib 9.14, 1 Jo 1.7, 4.10, Lep 3.14, 17.14 Pen Jisas Klays ne God takaw agak ak dad apɨl yɨpɨd gɨl nep agɨl, jɨj gɨ kumɨl tɨkjakɨl, gapman bɨnonɨm lum awl mɨdebal abe kɨlop kodup ak, ne abe nɨbop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gek mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨb.
